content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Searching content\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" explains the search functionality in Contentstack.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/how-search-works/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How search works\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Contentstack’s Search functionality allows you to look for any assets or entries located within a particular stack.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/about-basic-search/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"About basic search\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Basic Search is a full-text search that compares every word of your search phrase with all the values used in all the fields of entries or assets.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/about-advanced-search/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"About advanced search\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The advanced search option within the search bar lets you perform a field-level search on entries and assets.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/bulk-operations-on-search-results/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bulk operations on search results\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Perform bulk operations, such as publish, unpublish, delete, or move, on search results in a single action.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/save-your-searches/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Saving your searches\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Irrespective of the type of search (basic or advanced) that you are performing, you can save your search query.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/search-limitations/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Search limitations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". View the limitations of the search functionality, such as the number of search queries, publishing limitations, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/search-content/search-faqs/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Search FAQs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". See the frequently asked questions about search, such as ‘can you nest conditions/queries?’ and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
